description: The trumpet creeper (Campsis radicans f. flava) is a show-stopping plant that is sure to impress any passerby. With its beautiful, brilliant yellow flowers, lush glossy green leaves, and signature yellow-orange trumpet-shaped flowers, this species is definitely one to have in any garden. It is easy to grow, resists disease, and is very resilient in adverse weather conditions such as extreme heat or cold. The most interesting feature of this species is that it is fast-growing and can reach up to 30 feet in a single season. If you are looking for a plant that looks amazing and requires minimum care, this is definitely the one for you.
